content: this pattern is a simple project knit in the round with both sides seemed shut and sewn together to create a stylish twisted knot effect that can be worn in the front or in the back great for holiday handmade gifts or just keeping your ears warm this pattern is written for an adult woman with a 21 -23 head circumference but is easily adjustable to desired size needing only 100-120 yards of lite worsted weight yarn in one or two colors you can *easily* make more than one with a single skein of each i hope you enjoy this free pattern please don t forget to use the hashtag #yakimaearwarmer and at mention me @bentonhandmade on instagram
